name: df-fcls
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cfcls, cmpo(s0, s1, ctop, cuni(crn(cfil)), cif(ciin(s2, cv(s1), cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(s0)), cv(s2))), emptycls, wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), cuni(cv(s1))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ fClus =(s0 ∈ Top, s1 ∈ ⋃ ran(Fil)↦ if(⋃ s0 = ⋃ s1, ⋂(s2 ∈ s1,((cls ` s0)` s2)), ∅))
comment: Define a function that takes a filter in a topology to its set of cluster points. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 10-Nov-2009.)
